features: 🍴【48 Pcs Silverware Set With 8 Metal Straw Set】: 8 set/48 pcs silverware set contains: 8 dinner knives, 8 steak knives, 8 dinner forks, 8 dinner spoons, 8 salad/dessert forks, 8 tea/dessert spoons. 8 metal straws set contains: 8 metal straws, 8 silicone tips, 2 straw brushes. Our silverware set with metal straws can meet various dining needs and occasions.

🍴【Premium Stainless Steel】: This flatware set and straws are made of high quality food grade stainless steel which is very durable, rust-proof, corrosion resistant, non-toxic, BPA free, no metal aftertaste. Meanwhile, its sturdiness ensures that it will not bend easily providing you with long - term use. Most importantly, they're dishwasher safe.

🍴【Proper Weight And Comfortable Handle】: Unlike other brands, the curvature of our utensil handles is designed according to the posture of the hand, and the appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use that avoids you feel tired. Moreover, the smooth edges ensure safety and no scratches.

🍴【Multiple Polishing Process】: Multiple polishing process makes the edge of them round and smooth, which make sure NO cutting hands and NO scratching mouth. The silicone tips attached with straws can keep your lips from getting too cold or too hot and protect your teeth and lips from chipping.

🍴【Suit For Any Meal Needs】: The 48 pcs silverware set service for 8 contains various silverware for daily use. The 8 pcs stainless steel straws set could meet various drinking needs. They suit for upcoming holiday parties, gatherings, weddings, camping and entertainment, or for buffets and banquets at restaurants or hotels. It's also a wonderful choice as a gift.
🍴【Lifetime Warranty】: If you have any questions about our silverware set with reusable straws, please contact us and we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this silverware set, and I must say, I'm absolutely thrilled with my purchase. From the moment I opened the package, I could tell this was a quality product. The silverware has a beautiful, polished finish that adds a touch of elegance to any dining setting.The weight and feel of each piece are just right, giving it a substantial and premium feel in the hand. It's clear that this set was designed with both aesthetics and functionality in mind. The pieces are well-balanced, making them easy to handle and a pleasure to use.Not only do they look great, but they also hold up remarkably well. After multiple uses and dishwasher cycles, they still maintain their shine without any signs of tarnish or wear. This set is clearly built to last.In addition to its durability, the set includes a variety of utensils suitable for all types of meals and occasions. The versatility of this silverware set is one of its standout features.Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This silverware set is an exceptional value for the quality and style it offers. It has truly elevated my dining experience, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a high-quality silverware set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic everyday set!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after my sister-in-law purchased it for her own home. I was very impressed with the quality and weight of the utensils. Price is unbelievable! If you are looking for a modern, sturdy set of utensils, look no further. I have had them for a month now but my sister-in-law for a few months and they are no issues thus far. Steak knives and straws are a plus!
